declarations.description:
WebWriter Logic Circuit Widget

An interactive logic circuit designer that allows users to create, connect, and simulate digital logic circuits.
This widget provides a drag-and-drop interface for building circuits with various logic gates.
declarations.name: LogicCircuit

members.name: simulationDelay
members.description: Delay in milliseconds between simulation steps

members.name: allowSimulation
members.description:
Controls whether simulation functionality is available
- 0: Simulation disabled
- 1: Simulation enabled (default)

members.name: notGateAllowed
members.description:
Maximum number of NOT gates allowed
- -1: Unlimited (default)
- 0: Not allowed
- >0: Specific limit

members.name: andGateAllowed
members.description:
Maximum number of AND gates allowed
- -1: Unlimited (default)
- 0: Not allowed
- >0: Specific limit

members.name: orGateAllowed
members.description:
Maximum number of OR gates allowed
- -1: Unlimited (default)
- 0: Not allowed
- >0: Specific limit

members.name: nandGateAllowed
members.description:
Maximum number of NAND gates allowed
- -1: Unlimited (default)
- 0: Not allowed
- >0: Specific limit

members.name: norGateAllowed
members.description:
Maximum number of NOR gates allowed
- -1: Unlimited (default)
- 0: Not allowed
- >0: Specific limit

members.name: xnorGateAllowed
members.description:
Maximum number of XNOR gates allowed
- -1: Unlimited (default)
- 0: Not allowed
- >0: Specific limit

members.name: xorGateAllowed
members.description:
Maximum number of XOR gates allowed
- -1: Unlimited (default)
- 0: Not allowed
- >0: Specific limit

members.name: splitterAllowed
members.description:
Maximum number of splitter elements allowed
- -1: Unlimited (default)
- 0: Not allowed
- >0: Specific limit

members.name: simulateCircuit
members.description:
Start or stop circuit simulation
When enabled, propagates signals through the circuit with the configured delay.
Starts from input gates and follows connections through the circuit.

members.name: resetCircuit
members.description:
Reset the circuit to its initial state
Clears all gate outputs and connection states, returning the circuit to an inactive state

members.name: toggleInstructions
members.description:
Toggle the visibility of the instructions panel
Shows or hides the instruction panel that explains how to use the circuit builder

events.name: gate-added
events.description: Fired when a new gate is added to the circuit

events.name: gate-deleted
events.description: Fired when a gate is removed from the circuit

events.name: connection-made
events.description: Fired when two gates are connected

events.name: connection-removed
events.description: Fired when a connection is removed
